CustomField.description: This field checks the logged in user for certain conditions and returns a string based on the result. Used to check the user's role on the advice.
CustomField.formula: IF( Advice_Household__r.OW_dedicated_specialist__c = $User.Id, "Specialist lead", IF( Advice_Household__r.OwnerId = $User.Id, "Partner", IF( Assigned_planner__c = $User.Id, "Planner", "" )))
CustomField.label: User is
